intel_scout_brief.headline: NovaThera is reopening the IPO window with audit-proof AI
intel_scout_brief.why_now: FDA exam hits in six months while the board wants S-1 readiness, so every ML twin needs validated change control right now.

signal_stack.detail: FDA audit window triggers Q3 validation sprint [src-fda-window]

signal_stack.detail: Internal ML pod piloting AWS outside governed Azure landing zone [src-shadow-it]

signal_stack.label: Capital marker
signal_stack.detail: CFO needs deterministic FinOps view pre S-1 [src-finops]

risk_flags: Accenture Life Sciences lobbying hard for multi-year lock-in
gaps: Need latest headcount split between U.S. / EU plants
Confirm whether Board approved AWS carve-out

playbook.opening_angle: Lead with the audit clock, then pivot to neutral orchestration that tames shadow IT without slowing ML releases.

talk_tracks.title: Audit clock is loud
beats: Six-month FDA window means validation must be automated, not manual spreadsheets [src-fda-window]
Position our regulated cloud blueprint as the only way to pass the exam without freezing releases

talk_tracks.title: Shadow IT needs a referee
beats: ML teams spun up AWS workloads because Azure change approvals take 19 days [src-shadow-it]
Offer neutral orchestrator stance: we certify both clouds but keep policy-as-code in one control plane

talk_tracks.title: Cash discipline wins board votes
beats: CFO wants FinOps telemetry baked into every release [src-finops]
Show cost deltas per batch run, tie to S-1 story

cta_blocks.label: Send Audit-Ready ML Runbook
cta_blocks.microcopy: One-pager auto-fills with their twin stack

playbook.producer_notes: Keep gap tracker on-screen; if headcount data stays open, note it before CTA. Lower-thirds lt.audit_clock, lt.dual_cloud, lt.finops_dial already in kit.

host_script.copy: Chris: "NovaThera just circled a pre-IPO FDA audit, which means every digital twin they run has to be validated on autopilot in the next six months." [src-fda-window]
"Right now their ML pod spun up shadow AWS clusters because Azure change control drags to 19 days—board hates the blind spot." [src-shadow-it]
"Our neutral orchestrator play keeps both clouds in-bounds, stamps every model update with GMP evidence, and still ships weekly."
"And the CFO finally sees batch-by-batch spend deltas inside the FinOps cockpit, so that S-1 story doesn't wobble." [src-finops]
"If you're NovaThera, hit the Blueprint Workshop slot now—we'll bring the validated templates and the audit team."
"Backup if procurement drags? We can drop the audit-ready runbook today so production keeps flying."
"Gap check: still chasing the EU headcount split; if they confirm tonight we'll update the risk card before airtime."

safety_checks: No financial advice or revenue projections stated
All regulatory claims sourced to public filings or internal QA notes
call_studio.fallback_line: If legal flags the AWS shadow detail, pivot to: 'NovaThera's ML teams are racing outside the current guardrails; we're the fastest path to bring them back under validation.'
